column1: 10 pts - Great job identifying the business function and providing a clear explanation of how scrum/sprint could be implemented. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how scrum/sprint could operate. Great job explaining the implementation and reasoning behind your choice. Keep up the good work!
8 pts - Complete and clear description of poor fit. Great job explaining why kanban is not suitable for certain functions and providing specific examples. Keep up the good work!

10/10

Great job identifying the production stage as the business function that could benefit the most from implementing kanban methodologies. Your explanation of how kanban could operate for this function and the possible columns in the kanban board was clear and well-thought-out. Keep up the good work!

12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate. Great job in explaining the implementation of kanban for the production stage and providing specific details on the possible columns. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining why scrum/sprint may not be suitable for the production stage, but could use more clarity and detail. Keep up the good work!

5 pts - You have clearly identified the Availability Heuristic as a relevant bias in this situation and provided a thoughtful explanation of its potential impact on Jackson's decision-making process. Keep up the good work!

10/10

Great job defining Availability Heuristic and providing a clear explanation of its potential impact on decision-making. Keep up the good work!

12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job explaining the potential issues with cognitive biases and providing a clear implementation plan for both scrum/sprint and kanban methodologies. Keep up the good work!

8 pts - Reasonable description, but missing some detail. Good effort in explaining the implementation of scrum/sprint and kanban methodologies, but could use more clarity on specific steps and actions. Keep up the good work!
